issue.title: [CF 1641] Combat Event: Spell Cast Start
issue.body:
Hi, this setup https://imgur.com/a/yZ8ciDt won't activate the icon when CC is being cast, any idea as to why?

 

Combat Event  is "Casts > Spell Cast Start", as I want an icon to show when enemy is casting a CC.


> Posted by CurseForge user 2metragluposti | Imported from CurseForge issue #1641 | Raw

comments.body:
Works fine for me when testing with Polymorph.

 

You're using the CrowdControl equivalency, which is intended for buffs/debuffs. It doesn't necessarily have any correlation with spellIDs for the actual spell casts.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'll check it ASAP, please bear with me. Can I use generic names like Hex; Polymorph; Cyclone; etc?

Edited Jan 1, 2019

> Posted by CurseForge user 2metragluposti

Yes, that is what I would recommend.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Seems this works: https://imgur.com/a/Zg2wsnO

 

Could you tell how much does this strain the CPU?


> Posted by CurseForge user 2metragluposti

Its going to be almost completely negligible. Combat Event is probably the least CPU-hungry icon type in TMW.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
